content: half_double_crochet in ea half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-2 do not turn 36 half_double_crochet hat brim round 12 increase round chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet *half_double_crochet in next 2 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch do not turn 48 half_double_crochet round 13 increase round chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet *half_double_crochet in next 3 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch do not turn 60 half_double_crochet lower edging slip_stitch in ea half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch and fasten_off crown trim join yarn to any free unused loop on crown then slip_stitch in ea free loop around join with slip_stitch and fasten_off finishing holding strand of yarn inside hat between rnds 11 & 12 insert crochet hook from outside of hat through to inside grab the strand of yarn with hook and pull through to outside of hat working loosely slip_stitch around entire hat forming a line of decorative chain stitches between rnds 11 & 12 this helps give the hat stability when worn join with slip_stitch and fasten_off weave in all ends copyright 2017 2008 kathy north -- www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes
